name: Epinephrine Chloride Solution
indications: nasal decongestant . apply locally drops spray , sterile swab , required .
contraindications: instructions diluting make epinephrine chloride solution epinephrine chloride solution 1 mg/ml isotonic salt solution 0.5 mg/ml 1 ml 1 ml 0.2 mg/ml 1 ml 4 ml 0.1 mg/ml 1 ml 9 ml note : solution pinkish darker yellow contains precipitate .
warningsAndPrecautions: carton contains one vial 10 mg/10 ml ( 1 mg/ml ) epinephrine chloride solution ( epinephrine nasal solution , usp ) amber glass vial . ndc 54288-123-01 10 ml vial product sterile opened . keep drugs reach children . store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) . ( usp controlled room temperature . ) refrigerate freeze , protect light . cap seal broken missing . manufactured : bpi labs , llc 12393 belcher rd , suite 450 largo , fl 33773
indications_original: For use as a nasal decongestant. Apply locally as drops or spray, or with a sterile swab, as required.
contraindications_original:
Instructions for diluting
                  
                  
                     
                     
                        
                            To make Epinephrine Chloride Solution
                           Epinephrine Chloride Solution 1 mg/mL
                           Isotonic Salt Solution
                        
                        
                            0.5 mg/mL
                            1 mL
                            1 mL
                        
                        
                            0.2 mg/mL
                            1 mL
                            4 mL
                        
                        
                            0.1 mg/mL
                            1 mL
                            9 mL
                        
                     
                  
                  
                     Note: Do not use the solution if it is pinkish or darker than yellow or if it contains a precipitate.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Each carton contains one vial of 10 mg/10 mL (1 mg/mL)  of Epinephrine Chloride Solution (Epinephrine Nasal Solution,USP) in an amber glass vial.
                  
                  NDC 54288-123-01         10 mL Vial
                  
                  
                     This product is sterile until opened.
                  
                  
                     Keep this and all drugs out of the reach of children.
                  
                  Store between 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F). (See USP Controlled Room Temperature.) Do not refrigerate or freeze, Protect from light.
                  
                     Do not use if cap seal is broken or missing.
                  
                  
                  
                     Manufactured by:
                  
                  BPI Labs, LLC
                  12393 Belcher Rd S, Suite 450
                  Largo, FL 33773
